rows: Initial instruction for the LLM (Large Language Model) that clearly defines the task the user wants to accomplish.For "API" mode, LLM uses AI Skill parameters if they are specified in theInput parametersandOutput parametersblocks and available to use.
html:
Property

Property description

Prompt

Initial instruction for the LLM (Large Language Model) that clearly defines the task the user wants to accomplish.

For "API" mode, LLM uses AI Skill parameters if they are specified in the Input parameters and Output parameters blocks and available to use.
